verses.text: \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, to the \w strangers|strong="G3927"\w* scattered \w throughout|strong="G1290"\w* \w Pontus|strong="G4195"\w*, \w Galatia|strong="G1053"\w*, \w Cappadocia|strong="G2587"\w*, \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Bithynia|strong="G0978"\w*,

Elect according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w foreknowledge|strong="G4268"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w sanctification|strong="G0038"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sprinkling|strong="G4473"\w* of the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, be \w multiplied|strong="G4129"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="G2128"\w* \add be\add* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w abundant|strong="G4183"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w* hath \w begotten|strong="G0313"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w again|strong="G0313"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* a \w lively|strong="G2198"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*,

\w To|strong="G1519"\w* an \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w* \w incorruptible|strong="G0862"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w undefiled|strong="G0283"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that fadeth not \w away|strong="G0263"\w*, \w reserved|strong="G5083"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* are \w kept|strong="G5432"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* to be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w Wherein|strong="G1722"\w* ye greatly \w rejoice|strong="G0021"\w*, though \w now|strong="G0737"\w* for a \w season|strong="G3641"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* need \w be|strong="G1163"\w*, ye \w are|strong="G2076"\w* in \w heaviness|strong="G3076"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w manifold|strong="G4164"\w* \w temptations|strong="G3986"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* the \w trial|strong="G1383"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, being \w much|strong="G4183"\w* more precious \w than|strong="G5093"\w* of \w gold|strong="G5553"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w perisheth|strong="G0622"\w*, \w though|strong="G1161"\w* it be \w tried|strong="G1381"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, might be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w appearing|strong="G0602"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w having|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w seen|strong="G1492"\w*, ye \w love|strong="G0025"\w*; \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w*, though \w now|strong="G0737"\w* ye \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \add him\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w believing|strong="G4100"\w*, ye \w rejoice|strong="G0021"\w* with \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w unspeakable|strong="G0412"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* full of \w glory|strong="G1392"\w*:

\w Receiving|strong="G2865"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \add even\add* the \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w of|strong="G5590"\w* \add your\add* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G4012"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* have \w enquired|strong="G1567"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* searched \w diligently|strong="G1830"\w*, who \w prophesied|strong="G4395"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add that should come\add* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*:

\w Searching|strong="G2045"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* what manner \w of|strong="G4169"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* did \w signify|strong="G1213"\w*, when it \w testified|strong="G4303"\w* beforehand the \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* \w of|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w that|strong="G5023"\w* should \w follow|strong="G3326"\w*.

Unto \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* it was \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* unto \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* they did \w minister|strong="G1247"\w* the \w things|strong="G0846"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G0312"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w reported|strong="G0312"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that have preached the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* sent \w down|strong="G0649"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; which \w things|strong="G3739"\w* the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w desire|strong="G1937"\w* to \w look|strong="G3879"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* gird \w up|strong="G0328"\w* the \w loins|strong="G3751"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w mind|strong="G1271"\w*, be \w sober|strong="G3525"\w*, and \w hope|strong="G1679"\w* to the \w end|strong="G5049"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* that is to be \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w obedient|strong="G5218"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* fashioning yourselves according \w to|strong="G4964"\w* the \w former|strong="G4386"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w ignorance|strong="G0052"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G2596"\w* he which hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* is \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w ye|strong="G0846"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* manner of \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w*;

\w Because|strong="G1360"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, Be \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye call \w on|strong="G1941"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* without respect of \w persons|strong="G0678"\w* \w judgeth|strong="G2919"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* every \w manâ€™s|strong="G1538"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w pass|strong="G0390"\w* the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w sojourning|strong="G3940"\w* \add here\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*:

Forasmuch as ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w were|strong="G3084"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w redeemed|strong="G3084"\w* with corruptible \w things|strong="G5349"\w*, \add as\add* \w silver|strong="G0694"\w* \w and|strong="G2228"\w* \w gold|strong="G5553"\w*, \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w vain|strong="G3152"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* \add received\add* by tradition from your \w fathers|strong="G3970"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* with the \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* of a \w lamb|strong="G0286"\w* without \w blemish|strong="G0299"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* without \w spot|strong="G0784"\w*:

Who \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* was \w foreordained|strong="G4267"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2602"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* was \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* these \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w times|strong="G5550"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* do \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*; \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* might \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Seeing ye have \w purified|strong="G0048"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w obeying|strong="G5218"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w unfeigned|strong="G0505"\w* love of the \w brethren|strong="G5360"\w*, \add see that ye\add* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* a \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w fervently|strong="G1619"\w*:

Being born \w again|strong="G0313"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w corruptible|strong="G5349"\w* \w seed|strong="G4701"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* of \w incorruptible|strong="G0862"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, which \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w abideth|strong="G3306"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1360"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \add is\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w grass|strong="G5528"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w flower|strong="G0438"\w* of \w grass|strong="G5528"\w*. The \w grass|strong="G5528"\w* \w withereth|strong="G3583"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w flower|strong="G0438"\w* \w thereof|strong="G0846"\w* falleth \w away|strong="G1601"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w word|strong="G4487"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w endureth|strong="G3306"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* by the gospel is \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.
